name: Puddle vs. Pollution
description:
I decided the join this game jam to wind down from the GMTK jam which I went full throttle into with a team of three. That did not happen. I pushed myself to my very limits to see exactly what I could accomplish on my own, and I'm proud to show you that this is the result. 

Cover art drawn generously by my sister. Thank you!

Feel completely free to share videos or screenshots of your highscores in the comments! All content regarding this game is greatly appreciated.

Instructions (Detailed version):

Move with WASD and aim with mouse.
Left click to shoot enemies.
As you play your healthbar will fill with pollution.
This healthbar is shared between you and your pond.
Actions that cause your healthbar to fill with pollution include:
Passively filling itself, shooting, taking damage, and allowing enemies to reach the centre.
The more pollution you have the weaker you will be (i.e. less movement speed and damage).
If your healthbar fills entirely with pollution you will lose the game.
Press space while at the pond in the centre to cleanse yourself, this will remove all of your pollution in exchange for a permanent debuff.
